name: SleepyWords
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: sleepy words
des:
Sleepy Words helps you fall asleep faster! Say "Alexa, open Sleepy Words" and listen as Alexa reads a you a list of things for you imagine. This theory of sleep induction, "the cognitive shuffle", has been proposed by professor Luc P. Beaudoin. As you imagine each, your imagination distracts you, helping you to sleep.


To Enable the Skill: Say "Alexa, enable Sleepy Words skill" or search for "Sleepy Words skill" in the Alexa mobile app or on Amazon.com.

To Get Started: Say "Alexa open Sleepy Words". That's it.

Alexa will read 100 words, roughly 15 minutes worth, or until you say "Alexa, Stop".
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
